abstract: Southern California Gas Company has located well pipe breach responsible for spewing mercaptan--pungent, putrid-smelling natural gas additive--into Porter Ranch area of Los Angeles since October; utility will pay for relocation of thousands of sickened residents.
lead_paragraph: Officials say they have pinpointed the underground location of a well pipe that for weeks has spewed noxious odors into a Los Angeles neighborhood.

headline.main: California: Utility Officials Find Source of Noxious Odor
headline.print_headline: California: Utility Officials Find Source of Noxious Odor

snippet: Officials say they have pinpointed the underground location of a well pipe that for weeks has spewed noxious odors into a Los Angeles neighborhood.
